item.title: Ulta Beauty 首席执行官警告第一季度需求低迷，拖累同行，业绩下滑
item.description: Ulta Beauty 公司高管表示，第一季度各品类需求放缓，拖累了同行 elf Beauty、Coty 和 Estee Lauder 的业绩，该公司股价周三暴跌 14%。【原文：Shares of Ulta Beauty tumbled as much as 14% on Wednesday after executives flagged a slowdown in demand across categories in the first quarter, dragging down peers elf Beauty, Coty and Estee Lauder.】

item.title: Stellantis 首席执行官：未来十年汽车行业必须将电动汽车电池重量减半
item.description: Stellantis 公司负责人周三表示，汽车行业必须在未来 10 年内将电动汽车电池的重量减轻 50%，才能使电气化对环境产生意义。【原文：The automotive industry will have to reduce the weight of EV batteries by 50% in the next 10 years to make electrification environmentally meaningful, the head of Stellantis said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国 FDA 称，礼来公司生产的部分剂量 Zepbound 在 4 月底前供应短缺
item.description: 美国卫生监管机构网站显示，由于需求增加，礼来公司的两剂减肥药Zepbound将限量供应到4月底。【原文：Two doses of Eli Lilly's weight-loss drug, Zepbound, would be available in limited amounts through end of April due to increased demand, the U.S. health regulator's website showed.】

item.title: 好市多为会员提供包括药物在内的减肥计划
item.description: 好市多批发公司（Costco Wholesale）将为其会员提供减肥计划，包括在线医疗服务提供商芝麻公司（Sesame）提供的处方药 Ozempic 和 Wegovy。【原文：Costco Wholesale will offer its members access to weight-loss programs, including prescription drugs Ozempic and Wegovy, from online healthcare services provider Sesame, as the companies expanded their partnership.】

item.title: 美国债券经理人 PIMCO 认为美联储将在年中降息，但会逐步放宽政策
item.description: 美国债券巨头 PIMCO 周三表示，美联储很可能在今年年中开始降息，但与其他发达市场相比，美国的宽松周期将更加渐进。【原文：The Federal Reserve is likely to start cutting interest rates midyear but the easing cycle will be more gradual in the United States than in other developed markets, U.S. bond giant PIMCO said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 让特朗普媒体上市的公司投资者承认内幕交易罪
item.description: 美国前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的媒体业务上市的公司的一名早期投资者周三在曼哈顿承认了联邦内幕交易指控。【原文：An early investor in the company that took former U.S. President Donald Trump's media business public pleaded guilty in Manhattan on Wednesday to a federal insider trading charge.】

item.title: 台积电在台湾地震后停止工地施工
item.description: 全球最大的合约芯片制造商台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司周三表示，受 7.2 级地震影响，该公司在台湾的建筑工地已暂停施工。【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co , the world's biggest contract chipmaker, said on Wednesday it has suspended work at its construction sites in Taiwan as a fallout of the 7.2 magnitude earthquake.】

item.title: 美国服务业 3 月份温和扩张；价格压力有所缓解
item.description: 3 月份，美国服务业增长进一步放缓，而衡量企业支付投入的价格降至四年来的最低点，这对通胀前景是个好兆头。【原文：U.S. services industry growth slowed further in March, while a measure of prices paid by businesses for inputs dropped to a four-year low, which bodes well for the inflation outlook.】

item.title: 华尔街准备迎接美国税季流动性考验
item.description: 华尔街正在为货币市场可能出现的压力做准备，在美国税日到来之前将一些现金放在一边，届时与税收相关的大量资金外流可能会损害市场的流动性。【原文：Wall Street is bracing for a potential bout of stress in money markets by putting some cash on the side ahead of U.S. tax day, when high tax-related outflows could hurt market liquidity.】

item.title: 美联储主席博斯蒂克称今年第四季度将首次降息
item.description: 亚特兰大联储主席拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）周三表示，美联储在今年年底之前不应下调基准利率，他坚持认为美国央行在2024年期间只应降低一次借贷成本。【原文：The Federal Reserve should not cut its benchmark interest rate until the end of this year, Atlanta Fed President Raphael Bostic said on Wednesday, as he maintained his view that the U.S. central bank should reduce borrowing costs only once over the course of 2024.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，亚马逊网络服务公司裁员数百名技术和销售人员
item.description: 据新闻网站 The Information 周三报道，亚马逊网络服务公司（Amazon Web Services）已在其负责实体零售店技术的部门裁员数百人，并在其销售、营销和全球服务部门裁员数百人。【原文：Amazon Web Services has laid off a few hundred employees in its unit that works on technology for physical retail stores, and several hundred more in its sales, marketing and global services division, news site The Information reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 汽车托运公司 Wallenius Wilhelmsen 因巴尔的摩灾难损失高达 1,000 万美元
item.description: 挪威汽车运输公司Wallenius Wilhelmsen周三表示，上周美国巴尔的摩桥梁坍塌事故预计将对公司核心盈利造成500万至1000万美元的损失，并预计主要航道将关闭数周。【原文：Norwegian car shipping firm Wallenius Wilhelmsen estimates a $5 million to $10 million hit to core earnings from last week's U.S. Baltimore bridge collapse and expects the key ship channel to be closed for weeks, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 福特第一季度美国汽车销量增长 6.8%
item.description: 福特汽车公司（Ford Motor Co）报告称，受皮卡和跨界 SUV 需求的推动，第一季度美国汽车销量增长了 6.8%。【原文：Ford Motor Co reported a 6.8% rise in first-quarter U.S. auto sales, driven by demand for its pickup trucks and crossover SUVs.】

item.title: 微软和 Quantinuum 宣称在量子计算领域取得突破
item.description: 微软公司和 Quantinuum 公司周三表示，他们已经迈出了关键一步，使量子计算机更加可靠，从而使量子计算机成为商业现实。【原文：Microsoft and Quantinuum on Wednesday said they have achieved a key step in making quantum computers a commercial reality by making them more reliable.】

item.title: 摩根大通推出数字媒体业务
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase）周三推出了一项新的数字媒体业务，允许广告商根据华尔街银行 8000 万客户的消费数据对其进行定向投放。【原文：JPMorgan Chase on Wednesday launched a new digital media business that would allow advertisers to target the Wall Street bank's 80 million customers based on their spending data.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称中国政府敦促先正达撤回90亿美元上海IPO计划
item.description: 四位知情人士称，中国政府敦促瑞士农化和种子集团先正达（Syngenta）撤回其推迟已久的在上海首次公开募股（IPO）的申请，原因是担心规模庞大的新股发行会对动荡的市场产生影响。【原文：Chinese authorities nudged Swiss agrichemicals and seeds group Syngenta to withdraw its application for a long-delayed $9 billion IPO in Shanghai on concerns about the impact a sizeable new offering would have on a volatile market, four people said.】

item.title: 分析师称台湾地震将影响部分芯片产量，导致亚洲供应链中断
item.description: 分析师称，台湾自 1999 年以来发生的最大地震可能会对整个亚洲的半导体供应链造成一定程度的干扰，此前从台积电（TSMC）到联电（UMC）的芯片制造商都停止了部分业务，以检查设施和重新安置员工。【原文：Taiwan's biggest earthquake since 1999 is likely to cause some disruption across Asia's semiconductor supply chain, analysts say, after chipmakers from TSMC to UMC halted some operations to inspect facilities and relocate employees.】

item.title: 美国 3 月私营部门就业人数好于预期
item.description: 美国 3 月份私营企业薪资增幅超过预期，表明劳动力市场持续走强。【原文：U.S. private payrolls increased more than expected in March, pointing to continued labor market strength.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利承诺在金丝雀码头的住宅至少使用到 2038 年
item.description: 摩根士丹利英国分公司已将其位于伦敦金丝雀码头的 54.7 万平方英尺欧洲总部的租约延长至 2038 年，即使在竞争对手纷纷搬迁以寻求更小办公室的情况下，摩根士丹利仍将继续坚守这个码头区金融中心。【原文：Morgan Stanley's UK arm has extended a lease on its 547,000 square foot European headquarters in London's Canary Wharf to 2038, committing to the Docklands financial hub even as rivals relocate in search of smaller offices.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，特斯拉将在印度为价值 20 亿至 30 亿美元的电动汽车工厂选址
item.description: 据《金融时报》周三报道，特斯拉将于本月派遣一支团队前往印度，为拟投资 20 亿至 30 亿美元的电动汽车工厂选址。【原文：Tesla will send a team to India this month to scout locations for a proposed $2 billion to $3 billion electric car plant, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 代工业务亏损凸显与竞争对手台积电的巨大差距，英特尔业绩下滑
item.description: 周三收盘前，英特尔股价下跌 5%，原因是其合约芯片制造业务的亏损不断扩大，这表明该公司可能需要数年时间才能赶上台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（TSMC）的盈利能力。【原文：Intel shares fell 5% before the bell on Wednesday, as ballooning losses at its contract chip-making business signaled the company could take years to catch up with the profitability of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. .】

item.title: 消息人士称欧佩克+部长们保持石油产出政策稳定
item.description: 欧佩克+组织的三位消息人士在会议召开期间表示，欧佩克+组织的最高部长会议维持了石油产出政策不变。【原文：A meeting of the top ministers of OPEC+ has kept oil output policy unchanged, three OPEC+ sources said while the meeting was under way.】

item.title: 央行首次大规模降息标志着 3 月份周期的转折
item.description: 瑞士在 3 月份启动了主要央行的降息周期，而新兴经济体的宽松步伐则再次加快。【原文：Switzerland kickstarted the rate cutting cycle among major central banks in March while the easing push re-accelerated across emerging economies.】

item.title: 即将卸任的波音公司首席执行官卡尔霍恩不再竞选连任卡特彼勒董事会成员
item.description: 波音公司即将离任的首席执行官戴夫-卡尔霍恩（Dave Calhoun）周三在一份监管文件中表示，在卡特彼勒 2024 年度股东大会上，该公司将不再竞选连任董事会成员。【原文：Dave Calhoun, outgoing CEO of Boeing , will not stand for re-election to the board of Caterpillar at the company's 2024 annual shareholders meeting, the construction equipment maker said in a regulatory filing on Wednesday.】

item.title: 空中客车公司第一季度交付了 142 架飞机 - 消息来源
item.description: 业内人士称，空中客车公司第一季度交付了 142 架飞机，比去年同期增长了 12%。【原文：Airbus delivered 142 aircraft in the first quarter, up 12% from the same period last year, industry sources said.】

item.title: 投资者寻求利率前景的线索，期货市场趋于宽松
item.description: 周三，美国股指期货走低，投资者在等待经济数据和美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的评论，此前美国经济的强劲表现缓和了对今年降息的押注。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged lower on Wednesday as jittery investors awaited economic data and comments from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell after strong readings on the U.S. economy tempered bets on interest rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 迪士尼有望在激烈的佩尔茨董事会之争中获胜
item.description: 本周三，华特-迪斯尼公司将宣布，股东们否决了两家对冲基金提出的动摇这家娱乐巨头董事会的要求，一场耗资数百万美元、围绕迪斯尼未来展开的泥潭争夺战将正式落下帷幕。【原文：A multimillion dollar, mud-slinging battle over Walt Disney's future will officially end on Wednesday when the company is expected to announce that shareholders rejected two hedge fund bids to shake up the entertainment giant's board.】

item.title: 第一季度对冲基金在股市上涨的推动下反弹
item.description: 投资者表示，由于股票、部分大宗商品和美元的反弹帮助对冲基金行业度过了债券的低迷期，对冲基金在第一季度的不同策略中都取得了收益。【原文：Hedge funds capped the first quarter with gains across different strategies, as a rally in stocks, some commodities and the dollar helped the industry weather a less shiny period for bonds, investors said.】

item.title: 早间竞价：鲍威尔、数据、台湾地震令市场持续紧张
item.description: 塞缪尔-因迪克对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by Samuel Indyk】

item.title: 希腊批准从美国采购35架黑鹰直升机
item.description: 两名知情人士告诉路透社，希腊已批准从美国国防承包商洛克希德-马丁公司购买35架UH-60M "黑鹰 "直升机，以实现武装部队的现代化。【原文：Greece has approved the purchase of 35 UH-60M Blackhawk helicopters from U.S defence contractor Lockheed Martin Corp in an effort to modernize its armed forces, two people with knowledge of the deal told Reuters.】
